content: We have a clippy lint that lints a match expression with a single arm. But it is a false positive when the matched expression has a temporary like match format_args!(... How do I check a HIR expression if it contains any temporaries? I tried playing with various methods of ScopeTree but couldn't find a solution. I think I may need to use a Visitor but I figured I should ask for help before going further.
...or does this require MIR analysis? :scared:
